thread.title: On - Line Sportsman Business For Sale
thread.title_full: On - Line Sportsman Business For Sale

title: On - Line Sportsman Business For Sale
text: Questions Business Summary This is an On-Line business that is self reliant! This is for the sportsman and outdoorsman. My business is Truck Stencils.com I have been on Sportsmen channel and featured in 4 hunting/outdoor magazines. I am the designer, developer and owner of this business. My product sell around the world. I have another company that does all the shipping for me so there is little to do. I work about 10 hours monthly and make between $1500 to $2000.00 a month. All the leg work is done and all materials and media comes with it. All we have to do is change names as the owner. Of coarse I will help with education and set up for the new owner. There is many Points of contact I have made through out the country that helps with advertising and public recognition. I have between $28,000 to $35,000 of materials ready for sale and media and advertising commercials already for use. I also do hunting outdoors shows that help push my product and get the name spread around. I am asking $55,000. Please check out my website TruckStencils.com to get a feel of the company and products. Thank You! Financials
